entries.title: Indie game gems you may have missed in 2022
entries.description: From 'Tunic' to 'Norco' and 'Lil Gator Game,' here are the indie games of 2022 you really don't want to miss.

entries.title: 6 easy fixes to avoid tech headaches in 2023
entries.description: Every one of us will run into an unexpected tech issue in the new year. Here are a few things to make your life a little less stressful.

entries.title: As AI writing gets better, teachers work to stop the inevitable cheating
entries.description: ChatbotGPT offers a glimpse at a future in which computer-generated answers may be undetectable.

entries.title: The year AI became eerily human
entries.description: This year brought advances in AI chatbots and image makers, along with a brewing fight over the data that feeds them

entries.title: A 72-year-old congressman goes back to school, pursuing a degree in AI
entries.description: The U.S. congressman aims to apply his artificial-intelligence knowledge to his legislative work as the technology evolves further.
